New Records: Boston Celtics set a single-game franchise record and tied the all-time NBA high with 29 made threes in a single game
Key Match Events: The Celtics hit 29 threes in the blowout win
Every Boston starter hit at least three triples in the win

Others: Jayson Tatum went 8-for-11 on threes as part of a superb 37-point, 10-assist performance
Derrick White and Jaylen Brown were 6-of-10 and 5-of-9, finishing with 24 and 23 points, respectively
